title: Home service provider verification (plumber/electrician)
dataVerified: Tradesperson name, photo, license number, company, complaints history
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Woman alone at home verifies tradesperson credentials before letting them in. Domain binding verifies government trade licensing authority (e.g., competent-person-schemes.gov.uk) or established marketplace (checkatrade.com, trustmark.org.uk). Critical dual purpose: (1) Safety - prevents unlicensed/fake tradesperson fraud targeting vulnerable people at home. (2) Accountability/tax compliance - creates paper trail for insurance claims, warranty documentation, and discourages cash-in-hand tax evasion (tradesperson knows visit is documented). Protects homeowners and promotes legitimate trade practices.
